title: Licensed Transportation Services
text_content:
What Is a Licensed Transportation Service?
A licensed transportation service can be a limousine, taxicab, sightseeing carrier, or another type of transportation services provider. Aside from a few exceptions, such companies are required to meet certain requirements and to be licensed by the Department of Motor Vehicles.
Find a Transportation Provider
Looking to hire a limousine or moving company or find a taxicab? Search DMV's
List of Approved Carriers
to find one in your location.
Notices of Motor Carrier Certificates and License Applicants
The applicants listed below are requesting operating authority to transport either household goods or passengers for compensation or arrange for the transportation of property or passengers for compensation.
Select an applicant below to see detailed information about the authority requested or about the protest process.
